content.rendered:
Directed by Neeraj Pandey.

Written by Bharat Sundaresan.

Cast Ravichandran Ashwin (Self). Cheteshwar Pujara (Self). Rishabh Pant (Self). Hanuma Vihari (Self). Mohammed Siraj (Self). Pat Cummin/Eps (Self). Tim Paine (Self). Washington Sundar (Self). Paddy Upton (Self)

Languages English. Hindi.

Producers Shital Bhatia. Sudip Tewari. Roohani Yagnik.

Production Bootroom Sports Production. Friday Storytellers.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 4

Status On Going (2022–)
